nice_to_have.issue: Safari iOS specific behavior considerations not documented

changes_made.description: Added 'コンポーネントアンマウント時にタイマーがクリアされるテスト' to FileTreeView.test.tsx test list
Renamed section to '標準メニュー抑制とタッチ最適化', added touch-action: manipulation CSS property recommendation with MDN reference link
Added Stage 8 entry documenting NTH-001 and NTH-002 resolutions

overall_assessment.notes: Issue #123 has completed 2 full iterations of multi-stage review. All Must Fix and Should Fix items from both iterations have been addressed. Nice to Have items from Stage 7 have been applied to improve test completeness and browser compatibility documentation. The Issue is now comprehensive and ready for implementation.
